name: Harvey Milk Civil Rights Academy
description: School Type: Elementary School Serves grades: TK, K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper This school provides strong literacy skills in an enriched environment, science and math skills with an emphasis on hands-on, inquiry-based curriculum and a social studies program that highlights global awareness and student activism. Other benefits includes: - Civil Rights curriculum through all grades - Culinary arts program - A newly renovated library - Visual and performing
